title: Vote today!
author: VD
content_html:
If you backed Will Caligan’s Comic campaign, please check your email today. You will be receiving a survey that will permit you to cast ONE vote for the book or books you most want to see converted into a graphic novel. Simply click on the title you prefer to vote; note that a vote for The Green Knight’s Squire will take up two of the three graphic novels.

If, for some reason, you did not receive the survey by this afternoon, please email me with your backer number and your choice of the following options:

  • Flashpoint: Titan
  • Rocky Mountain Retribution
  • Swan Knight’s Son
  • Sword and Flower
  • The End of the World as We Knew It
  • The Green Knight’s Squire
  • The Lawdog Files
  • The Stars Came Back

The results will be announced here on Monday. Thank you all so much for making this happen!
